name: Featured Image from Content
author: Dhrumil Kumbhani

sections.description:
The “Featured Image from Content” plugin is a game-changer for WordPress bloggers and website owners. Are you tired of the hassle of manually selecting and uploading featured images for every post? Look no further! Our plugin takes the hard work out of the equation by automatically scanning your post content and choosing the most relevant and eye-catching image to set as your featured image.

Key Features:

  1. Automated Image Selection: Say goodbye to the tedious task of handpicking featured images. Our plugin’s intelligent algorithm scans your content and picks the perfect image to represent your post.

  2. Boost SEO: Improve your website’s SEO by ensuring each post has a relevant and visually appealing featured image. Search engines love high-quality visuals.

  3. Save Time: With automatic image selection, you can focus on creating great content while the plugin takes care of your featured images.

  4. Customization: You’re in control. Customize the plugin’s settings to match your preferences and ensure it selects images that align with your brand.

  5. No More Empty Featured Image: Don’t let your posts go live with a missing featured image. Our plugin guarantees that every post has an engaging visual element.

  6. Image Quality Control: Set image size and quality parameters to ensure your selected images always look their best.
sections.installation:
follow the below instructions to install this plugin to your WordPress website.

Ex.

  1. Upload to the wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to the setting section and open Featured Image from Content.
  4. Select the Post Type to set featured images automatically and save it.
  5. Enjoy!
sections.changelog:
1.0 – May 23th, 2023

  • First release

1.1 – Oct 4th, 2023

  • Upload reference image and test on wordpress 6.3.1

1.2 – Nov 28th, 2023

  • Improvements and tested with the latest WordPress version 6.4.1.

short_description: Streamline your WordPress experience with the Featured Image from Content plugin! Automatically set eye-catching images for your posts hassle-free
